note.p: Geologist and naturalist. Geologist to several expeditions to Scandinavian countries in the 1830s and 1840s. Travelled with the Tréhouart expedition to Iceland and Greenland, 1835–6; wrote on the geology and mineralogy of the area. Wrote a natural history of the commune of Meudon, France.
Bulletin de l’Alliance des arts 25 January 1844, pp. 231–2
Bulletin des séances de la Société nationale d’agriculture de France: compte rendu mensuel (1882): 392
